ProcessSynonym: unconsumed Live branches, stumps and small trees including bark
Pseudocode: (1-(mortality rate of conifers)*branch fraction of "other" pool)+(1-(medium DOM consumption rate)*stump fraction of other pool)+(1-(global mortality of submerch conifers in severity class)*small tree fraction of other pool)+(1-CFB*bark fraction of other pool)
Notes: Note: unconsumed but dead bark remains in "other" pool here?

ProcessSynonym: Portion of "other" pool as killed by fire but unconsumed branches
Pseudocode: [CFB*(branch fract of other)+(fraction of branches consumed)]+[(mort-CFB)*(brach fract of other)]
Notes: Note: taking into account that large diameter branches don't get consumed in a crown fire, so they convert to snags. Also: given the mortality-CFB can sometimes be positive or negative, enforcing a min value of zero here.

ProcessSynonym: Proportional Combustion sum of branches, stumps, small trees and bark
Notes: Assuming small trees (<1.3 height?) burn alongside litter

ProcessSynonym: Understory conifer branches killed but not consumed

Notes: all but snag should be 100% consumption

ProcessSynonym: Uncombusted Fraction of Dead fine roots in the mineral soil, approximately <5 mm diameter
Uncombusted Fine and small woody debris plus dead coarse roots in the forest floor, approximately <75 mm diameter
Pseudocode: 1-[(litter surface area fraction burned*woody debris portion of AGFastDOM)+(Dead coarse root fraction of AGFastDOM*(fraction of duff consumed)]
Notes: ***Needs renaming, logic good ***Assume all woody fine+small woody debris is combusted, but only fractional combustion of dead coarse roots alongside duff

ProcessSynonym: Combusted FWD+MWD fraction (dead course roots accounted for in AG Slow DOM)
Pseudocode: [(litter surface area fraction burned*woody debris portion of AGFastDOM)+(Dead coarse root fraction of AGFastDOM*(fraction of duff consumed)]*(Woody debris fraction of pool)*FlamingCO2+Root Fraction of pool*SmoulderingCO2)

ProcessSynonym: Combusted FWD+MWD fraction (dead course roots accounted for in AG Slow DOM)

ProcessSynonym: Combusted FWD+MWD fraction (dead course roots accounted for in AG Slow DOM)
